entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
